title: Can't find out what my mystery skin gift is , can someone please help me ?
body:
I recieved a gift from riot , and bcuz i didnt know how it worked i clicked out of it before i could saw what skin i got .
I tried to look at purchase history , also gifts recieved and there was nothing there . 
can someone please help me ?

replies.body:
We've been running quite a number of promotions for Summoner Icons, so I'm inclined to agree with *Mr Oxpar* here and say that it was likely one of them.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
i am pretty sure it was an icon, just check if u got a new one. they gave away some for taking part in the pick'em while worlds and for the devil teemo minigame and ingame
